name: Bindings of the Lesser Gods
flavorText: For those who may not be sufficiently holy to find refuge in Inna’s arms.
flavorTextHtml: For those who may not be sufficiently holy to find refuge in Inna’s arms.

primary.textHtml: Critical Hit Chance Increased by [4.5 - 6.0]%

secondary.textHtml: Enemies hit by your Cyclone Strike take 157% increased damage from your Mystic Ally for 5 seconds. Split Fire Allies gain 5 times this bonus. (Monk Only) [150 - 200]%
